New Records: Steph Curry became the oldest point guard in NBA history with consecutive 30-point games.
Steph Curry joined LeBron James and Michael Jordan as the only 36-year-olds with back-to-back 35-point games.
Key Match Events: Steph Curry finished with a game-high 37 points to secure the win.
Klay Thompson's return to The Bay was a key moment in the game.
Post-Match Reflections: The Golden State Warriors improved to 9-2 through 11 games, tied for the best record in the Western Conference.
The Dallas Mavericks fell to 5-6, marking a disappointing start after their NBA Finals run.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Klay Thompson played well in his return to The Bay, tallying 22 points on 6/12 from three-point range.
